author.description: I'm Taylor, a content writer for TrainSinDepot. I'm also in spare time a railway enthusiast, you can find me on Flickr (https://www.flickr.com/people/191225072@N04/), on Instagram (https://www.instagram.com/taylorstravels07/) and also YouTube (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCp0eLbR8odL059XEcyvDSAA). Hope you enjoy my content!
